name: The Crash!
description:
Fly your plane across the Atlantic Ocean, facing many perils along the way!

This was a global game jam entry for 2022.

The theme was Duality.

Fly across the Atlantic Ocean facing perilous threats and wonderful people.

Gather resources to fuel your dreams.

Controls:
